details.whatsNew:
* 1.0.0-beta.3: Add support for Docker private repos; Fix support for DNAnexus Azure region
* 1.0.0-beta.2: First version of the Nextflow for DNAnexus

inputSpec.name: license
inputSpec.label: Activation license
inputSpec.help: The activation license to enable Nextflow for DNAnexus execution. It should be provided as a DNAnexus path e.g. dx://project-12345:/some/license.txt

inputSpec.name: pipeline_url
inputSpec.label: Pipeline URL
inputSpec.help: The Git repository of the pipeline project to be executed.

inputSpec.name: args
inputSpec.label: Nextflow run arguments & pipeline parameters
inputSpec.help: Provide Nextflow run arguments & pipeline parameters using (optional).

inputSpec.name: scm_file
inputSpec.label: Git repository credentials file
inputSpec.help: The Nextflow scm file providing the access credentials for private Git repository. It should be provided as a DNAnexus path e.g. dx://project-12345:/some/creds.txt

inputSpec.name: docker_creds_file
inputSpec.label: Docker credentials file
inputSpec.help: A file holding the credentials to access Docker private registries. It should be provided as a DNAnexus path e.g. dx://project-12345:/some/creds.txt

inputSpec.name: debug
inputSpec.label: Debug mode
inputSpec.help: Enable launcher script debug mode by setting this field to 'true' (optional).
